articles.content: The service is pre-installed on all new Bravia XR 4K and 8K models, including the Master Series Z9J 8K LED and Master Series A90J along with 4K LED models like the X90J and X80J (for a complete list,… [+643 chars]

articles.title: Samsung’s upcoming 65W USB-PD charger gets pictured - SamMobile
articles.description: Samsung has stayed out of the smartphone charging speed wars. While the competition has gone as high as 120W fast ...
articles.content: Samsung has stayed out of the smartphone charging speed wars. While the competition has gone as high as 120W fast charging with recent flagship releases, the South Korean tech giant’s smartphones sup… [+898 chars]

articles.title: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Titanium Yoga Preview - PCMag
articles.description: The new ThinkPad X1 Titanium Yoga business laptop has a stylish silver color and is the thinnest ThinkPad yet, but its keyboard might not be anything to type home about.
